<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1393996_scriptin_cconnectnow_practice</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Description</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var incident_ref = current.related_incident;

var ga = new GlideAjax('x_1393996_scriptin.Get_Incident_Number');   //Scriptinclude
 ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getIncidentNumber'); //Method
 ga.addParam('sys_id',incident_ref); //Parameters
 ga.getXMLAnswer(getResponse);

function getResponse(response){
  console.log(response);
  var res = JSON.parse(response);
  console.log(res);
  current.setValue('description',(g_form.getValue("description").trim.length>0?g_form.getValue("description")+res.number:"Above data is correct")+res.number);
  //g_form.setValue('description',(g_form.getValue("description").trim.length>0?g_form.getValue("description"):"Above data is correct")+res.number);
}
	// Add your code here

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-08 08:48:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>74996ec1c3d3c61037d1b7ddd40131d0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Description</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Scripting_Training" source="x_1393996_scriptin">36a66608c35b421037d1b7ddd4013181</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Scripting_Training">36a66608c35b421037d1b7ddd4013181</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_74996ec1c3d3c61037d1b7ddd40131d0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-08 11:43:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=74996ec1c3d3c61037d1b7ddd40131d0"/></record_update>
